data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 279,361 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Chungcheongnam-do
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 332,603 believers in Chungcheongnam-do against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, I pray that all the Malay people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Malay people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Malay people is yours.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea has a population of 2,033,000.

We estimate Chungcheongnam-do has 332,603 people who might know Jesus, 279,361 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,421,036 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
